title: Champion purchase
body: Why am I unable to purchase a new champion with IP when I have more then enough. The unlock button is none responsive and says not implemented...

replies.body: I don't see that the new champion is currently available to be unlocked.  Keep an eye on the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for any news on that.  hang tight!
I was not trying for the new champion I was trying to unlock Miss Fortune.
